org.apache.lens.driver.jdbc
Class JDBCDriver

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.lens.driver.jdbc.JDBCDriver
All Implemented Interfaces:
Externalizable, Serializable, LensDriver
public class JDBCDriver
extends Object
implements LensDriver

This driver is responsible for running queries against databases which can be queried using the JDBC API.

See Also:

estimate

public QueryCost estimate(AbstractQueryContext qctx)
                   throws LensException
Description copied from interface: LensDriver
Estimate the cost of execution for given query. This should be returned with very less latency - should return within 10s of milli seconds.

Specified by:
estimate in interface LensDriver
Parameters:
qctx - The query context
Returns:
The QueryCost object
Throws:
LensException - the lens exception if driver cannot estimate
